pkgmetadata.longdescription: Data Sets and Functions, supplementary to DAAG // various data sets used in additional exercises for the book Maindonald, J.H. and Braun, W.J. (3rd edn 2010) "Data Analysis and Graphics Using R", and for a 'Data Mining' course. Note that a number of datasets that were in earlier versions of this package have been transferred to the DAAG package.
